sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBCarousel, MDBCarouselCaption, MDBCarouselInner, MDBCarouselItem, MDBView, MDBMask, MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, } from "mdbreact"; import { getAideFromDB } from "../actions/aideActionCreator"; import Navbar from "./navbar"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; export class Accueil extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.getAideFromDB(); } render() { return (
{/**** * *****carousel *********/}

Light mask

First text

Strong mask

Second text

Slight Mast

Third text
{/************ * les filtres ***************/}
{/* ***********cards *******************/}
{this.props.aides.map((el) => (


{el.nom_Prenom}

Plus de détails

{el.Age}

{el.Ville}

{el.Exp}

Réserver
))}
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { aides: state.aides, }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getAideFromDB })(Accueil);
